content.rendered:
Cybelius provides two solutions to secure an industrial system: 

CyFENCE: DMZ which integrates all the security services protecting an industrial system. Read more.

CyFENCE & SIEM Service : In partnership with Gfi, this solution allows the exploitation of logs with the transmission of information to the IT manager, thanks to a monthly report. Read more.
